common.title: Common Settings
common.invalidProxyUrl: Invalid proxy URL, please enter valid http/https URL
common.addCustomSearchEngineDesc: Add a new search engine by providing a name and search URL. The URL must include {query} as the query placeholder.
common.searchEngineUrlError: URL must include {'{'}query{'}'} as the query placeholder
common.deleteCustomSearchEngineDesc: Are you sure you want to delete the custom search engine "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
common.testSearchEngineDesc: A test search for "weather" will be performed using the {engine} search engine.
common.testSearchEngineNote: If the search page requires login or other actions, you can perform them in the test window. Please close the test window when you're done.
common.contentProtectionEnableDesc: Enabling screen protection prevents screen sharing software from capturing the McpChat window, protecting your content privacy. Note that this feature will not completely hide all interfaces. Please use this feature responsibly and in compliance with regulations. Additionally, not all screen sharing software supports this feature. Additionally, some environments may leave a black window.
common.contentProtectionDisableDesc: Disabling screen protection will allow screen sharing software to capture the McpChat window.
common.contentProtectionRestartNotice: Changing this setting will restart the application. Do you want to continue?
common.loggingEnableDesc: Enabling logging will help us diagnose issues and improve the application. Log files may contain sensitive information.
common.loggingDisableDesc: Disabling logging will stop collecting application logs.
common.loggingRestartNotice: Changing this setting will restart the application. Do you want to continue?
common.notificationsDesc: When McpChat is not in the foreground, if a session is generated, a system notification will be sent

data.title: Data Settings
data.importConfirmDescription: Importing will overwrite all current data, including chat history and settings. Make sure you have backed up important data. You'll need to restart the application after import.

systemPrompt.label: System Prompt
systemPrompt.description: Set the system prompt for the AI assistant to define its behavior and role

temperature.label: Model Temperature
temperature.description: Controls the randomness of the output; higher values produce more creative responses

contextLength.label: Context Length
contextLength.description: Set the maximum length of the conversation context

responseLength.label: Response Length
responseLength.description: Set the maximum length of the AI response

artifacts.description: Enabling the Artifacts feature allows the AI to generate richer content
artifacts.title: Artifacts effects

disableModel.title: Confirm Disable Model
disableModel.content: Are you sure you want to disable model "{name}"?

disableAllModels.title: Confirm Disable All Models
disableAllModels.content: Are you sure you want to disable all models?

verify.missingFields: Please enter API Key and API URL

addCustomProvider.title: Add Custom Provider
addCustomProvider.description: Please fill in the necessary information for the provider
addCustomProvider.name: Name
addCustomProvider.baseUrlPlaceholder: Please enter the API base URL

deleteProvider.title: Confirm Delete Provider
deleteProvider.content: Are you sure you want to delete provider "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

deleteModel.title: Confirm Delete Model
deleteModel.content: Are you sure you want to delete model "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

provider.deleteModelConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete model "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
provider.githubCopilotLoginTip: Authorize McpChat to access your GitHub Copilot subscription. 'read:user' and 'read:org' permissions are required to access the Copilot API.

knowledgeBase.title: Knowledge Base Settings
knowledgeBase.selectKnowledgeBaseType: Please select the type of knowledge base to add
knowledgeBase.difyDescription: Dify knowledge base helps you manage and use document data
knowledgeBase.featureNotAvailable: This feature is not yet available
knowledgeBase.configAddedDesc: Dify knowledge base configuration has been successfully added
knowledgeBase.moreComingSoon: More knowledge base types coming soon
knowledgeBase.configUpdatedDesc: Dify knowledge base configuration has been successfully updated
knowledgeBase.descriptionPlaceholder: Example: Company product documentation knowledge base
knowledgeBase.ragflowDescription: RAGFlow is a powerful knowledge base management system that supports multiple retrieval methods and document management features.
knowledgeBase.fastgptDescription: FastGPT is a powerful knowledge base management system that supports multiple retrieval methods and document management features.

mcp.title: MCP Settings
mcp.description: Manage and configure MCP (Model Control Protocol) servers and tools
mcp.enabledDescription: Enable or disable MCP functionality and tools
mcp.enableToAccess: Please enable MCP to access configuration options
mcp.marketplace: Go to the MCP Market for one-click installation

serverForm.name: Server Name
serverForm.envPlaceholder: Enter environment variables in JSON format
serverForm.envInvalid: Environment variables must be valid JSON
serverForm.autoApproveHelp: Select operation types to auto-approve without user confirmation
serverForm.jsonConfigIntro: You can paste a JSON configuration directly or choose to configure the server manually.
serverForm.jsonConfigPlaceholder: Paste your MCP server configuration in JSON format
serverForm.invalidKeyValueFormat: Incorrect request header format, please check whether the input is correct.
serverForm.npmRegistryPlaceholder: Set up a custom NPM Registry, leave the system to automatically select the fastest one

mcp.confirmRemoveServer: Are you sure you want to delete server {name}? This action cannot be undone.

confirmDelete.title: Confirm Delete
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete server {name}? This action cannot be undone.

mcp.resetConfirmDescription: This will restore all default servers while keeping your custom servers. Any modifications to default servers will be lost.
mcp.builtInServerCannotBeRemoved: Built-in servers cannot be removed, only parameters and environment variables can be modified
mcp.maxDefaultServersReached: Only 3 default servers can be set at most
mcp.removeDefaultFirst: Please remove some default servers first

shortcuts.title: Shortcut Key Settings
shortcuts.pressEnterToSave: Press Enter to save, Esc to cancel
shortcuts.noModifierOnly: Cannot use modifier key alone as shortcut
shortcuts.keyConflict: Shortcut key conflict, please choose another combination
